snippet: Although no one rose up to challenge him, 12 Republicans rejected Speaker John A. Boehner’s leadership, a warning of further challenges ahead.
abstract: Twelve Republican representatives reject Rep John A Boehner's re-election as speaker of the House, in what is seen as warning shot from conservatives and sobering reminder that his power is greatly diminished; he will face new confrontations with Pres Obama and angry conservatives in next few months over spending cuts.
lead_paragraph: Although no one rose up to challenge him, 12 Republicans rejected Speaker John A. Boehner’s leadership, a warning of further challenges ahead.

headline.seo: Boehner, Liked but Not Feared, Keeps a Job
headline.main: Liked but Not Feared, Boehner Keeps a Job Some Might Ask Why He Wants
headline.print_headline: Liked but Not Feared, Boehner Keeps a Job Some Might Ask Why He Wants
